title: Siemtje Möller
summary:
Siemtje Möller (German pronunciation: [ˈziːmtjə ˈmœlɐ]; born 20 July 1983) is a German teacher and politician of the Social Democratic Party (SPD) who has been serving as a member of the Bundestag from the state of Lower Saxony since the 2017 elections.
In addition to her parliamentary work, Möller has been serving as Parliamentary State Secretary in the  Federal Ministry of Defence in the coalition government of Chancellor Olaf Scholz since 2021.
